variable.name: TWIN_ID
variable.description: Identifiers for monozygotic twins (or triplets) - twins or triplets have same ID; blank otherwise

variable.name: inbreeding
variable.description: Indicator for information about inbreeding or other family loops
variable.value: Consanguineous marriage in family known but not explicit in partial pedigree provided
No inbreeding but other family loop such as sisters mating with brothers or same woman mating with brothers

variable.name: revised
variable.description: Indicator for information about revision of pedigree during data cleaning
variable.value: Revision that brought pre-testing pedigree back to original pedigree
